title: I don't see runes in shop
body: I'm a beginner and planning to buy some runes but I don't see where to buy in the shop. I'm level 19 by the way

replies.body:
1. Click the store icon.
2. At the top you'll see a list of options.
3. Hit "Gameplay".
4. Runes should be auto-selected.

Let us know if you need further assistance.

Additionally, here's a screenshot of what it looks like in the client. (Click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/aiGZ7
